name: Battlezone - Military Camo Skins Pack
detailed_description: Customise the inside and outside of your Cobra with this pack of 5 Military Camo tank skins. Compatible with all 11 Battlezone tank chassis, mix and match any interior and exterior designs you own!
about_the_game: Customise the inside and outside of your Cobra with this pack of 5 Military Camo tank skins. Compatible with all 11 Battlezone tank chassis, mix and match any interior and exterior designs you own!
short_description: Customise the inside and outside of your Cobra with this pack of 5 Military Camo tank skins. Compatible with all 11 Battlezone tank chassis, mix and match any interior and exterior designs you own!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese-Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 processor equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
